column4: guest37801: LXDE is also very light weight, openbox is as well; xfce and mate are the middle between those and gnome 3 and unity, and cinnamon is on the more intensive end.
guest37801: LXDE is also very light weight, openbox is as well; xfce and mate are the middle between those and gnome 3 and unity, and cinnamon is on the more intensive end.
if you install lxde you get openbox, so you can just install openbox and ditch the lxde bit :)
